languages.text: "Служба инфернус поделена на бригады в зависимости от задач. Сердце Гильдии — это, конечно, наши ликвидаторы. Крепкие ребята со стальными нервами, которые тушат пожары и вытаскивают людей из огня. Другие у нас ремонтники и разбираются с проблемами вроде заклинивших дверей, протечек топлива или поломок в вентшахтах. А обходчики проверяют палубы, чтобы на случай аварий ничего не блокировало проходы между отсеками и доступы к коммуникациям".

"The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."
languages.original_text: "Служба инфернус поделена на бригады в зависимости от задач. Сердце Гильдии — это, конечно, наши ликвидаторы. Крепкие ребята со стальными нервами, которые тушат пожары и вытаскивают людей из огня. Другие у нас ремонтники и разбираются с проблемами вроде заклинивших дверей, протечек топлива или поломок в вентшахтах. А обходчики проверяют палубы, чтобы на случай аварий ничего не блокировало проходы между отсеками и доступы к коммуникациям".

traits.locale_text: "The Infernus Service is split into brigades depending on tasks. The heart of the Guild is, of course, our liquidators. Tough guys with nerves of steel who put out fires and pull people out of the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks or broken vents. And walking inspectors check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking passages or access to lines of communication."

languages.text: « Le service des Infernus est divisé en plusieurs brigades, chacune spécialisée dans un domaine particulier. Les liquidateurs sont, bien sûr, au cœur de la guilde. Des durs de durs aux nerfs d'acier, chargés d'éteindre les incendies et de tirer les gens des flammes. Il y a aussi les réparateurs, qui s'occupent des portes bloquées, des fuites de carburant, des conduits défectueux et autres problèmes du genre. Et puis, il y a les inspecteurs itinérants, qui arpentent les différents ponts pour s'assurer que rien ne bloque le passage ou les accès aux lignes de communication. »
languages.original_text: "The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."

languages.text: «El cuerpo de infernus se divide en distintas brigadas según sus responsabilidades. Por supuesto, el corazón del gremio son los sofocadores, gente dura con nervios de acero que apaga incendios y saca a la gente de entre las llamas. Otros son reparadores, que se encargan de puertas atrancadas, escapes de combustible o conductos obstruidos. Y luego están los inspectores ambulantes, que comprueban las cubiertas para asegurar de que nada bloquea el paso ni el acceso a las líneas de comunicación».
languages.original_text: "The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."

Y luego están los inspectores ambulantes, que comprueban las cubiertas para asegurar de que nada bloquea el paso ni el acceso a las líneas de comunicación».

languages.text: “控火行会根据任务划分成很多不同的部门。行会的核心自然是我们的消防员，他们是一群视死如归的硬汉，负责扑灭大火，把人们从火场中救出来。还有一部分人是修理工，负责处理类似于舱门卡死、燃油泄漏、通风口损坏之类的问题。除此之外，还有到处巡逻的监察员，他们负责检查甲板，确保所有通道与通讯线路畅通无阻。”
languages.original_text: "The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."

traits.locale_text: “控火行会根据任务划分成很多不同的部门。行会的核心自然是我们的消防员，他们是一群视死如归的硬汉，负责扑灭大火，把人们从火场中救出来。还有一部分人是修理工，负责处理类似于舱门卡死、燃油泄漏、通风口损坏之类的问题。除此之外，还有到处巡逻的监察员，他们负责检查甲板，确保所有通道与通讯线路畅通无阻。”

languages.text: 「インフェルヌスサービスは、任務に応じてさまざまな旅団に分かれている。ギルド中核には、もちろん清算人だ。鉄の心臓を持った強い奴らだ。火を消したり、人を火から救ったりをしている。他には、ドアの詰まりや燃料漏れ、通気口の破損といった問題に対処する修理工もいる。そして、通路や通信線へのアクセスのチェックをデッキでする、歩く検査官もいる」
languages.original_text: "The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."

traits.locale_text: 「インフェルヌスサービスは、任務に応じてさまざまな旅団に分かれている。ギルド中核には、もちろん清算人だ。鉄の心臓を持った強い奴らだ。火を消したり、人を火から救ったりをしている。他には、ドアの詰まりや燃料漏れ、通気口の破損といった問題に対処する修理工もいる。そして、通路や通信線へのアクセスのチェックをデッキでする、歩く検査官もいる」

languages.text: "Der Infernus-Dienst ist in verschiedene Brigaden unterteilt, die verschiedene Aufgaben haben. Das Herz der Gilde sind natürlich unsere Liquidatoren — beinharte Burschen mit Nerven aus Stahl, die Feuer löschen und Leute aus dem Flammen ziehen. Andere sind Techniker, die sich um Probleme wie klemmende Türen, Treibstofflecks oder defekte Lüftungen kümmern. Und dann gibt es noch die Inspektoren, die zu Fuß durch die Decks gehen und sicherstellen, dass alle Gänge und Kommunikationsanlagen frei zugänglich sind."
languages.original_text: "The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."

languages.text: "İtfa Hizmetleri, vazifelerine göre farklı tugaylara ayrılır. Lonca'nın kalbinde elbette tasfiye görevlilerimiz var. Yangınları söndüren ve insanları alevlerin içinden çekip çıkaran, çelikten sinirlere sahip, sert adamlar. Sonra tamirciler vardır. Sıkışan kapılar, yakıt sızıntıları veya bozulmuş havalandırmalar gibi sorunlarla ilgilenirler. Bir de gezgin müfettişler var. Güverteleri kontrol eder, geçitleri tıkayan veya iletişim hatlarına erişimi engelleyen bir şey olmadığından emin olurlar."
languages.original_text: "The Infernus Service is split into different brigades according to duties. The heart of the Guild are, of course, our liquidators — tough guys with nerves of steel, who put out fires and pull people from the flames. Others are repairmen, dealing with problems like jammed doors, fuel leaks, or broken vents. And then there's the walking inspectors, who check the decks to make sure that nothing is blocking any passages or access to communication lines."
